mongo.comment: MongoDB database link; e.g 'mongodb://USERNAME:PASSWORD@ds027479.mongolab.com:27479/DATABASE_NAME'. MONGO_URI: process.env.MONGODB_URL || ''

bot.token_comment: Your authorization token from the @botfather. Is string and quoted.
bot.id_comment: Bots ID number. It is numbers before colon in bots token. Is number and not quoted.

sudo.comment: Bot owner ID number. Is number and not quoted.

log.comment: The channel, group, or user to send error reports to. Is number and not quoted.
